title: The difference in this game just in one year
body: This game is absolute trash now, there's 0 balance in it you either play the champs that are strong in meta or you have a bad time. used to be fun and have a degree of competitiveness now its just trash I can't believe the difference! RIOT has just destroyed everything this game stood for in a short amount of time. congratulations its literally unplayable now

replies.body: Looks like you might have gone up in elo. LoL has been dominated by the meta for a while now. You just gotta give in and play those "op" picks for the patch.
Tbh that game is the most balanced its ever been imo
